Explain the change in 1-2 sentences.

- [ ] Feature

## How to test

Steps or commands to validate this change.

## Checklist

- [ ] Policy changes reflected in `ai/config/ai_policy.yaml` (or noted if N/A)
- [ ] Run `python ai/run.py` completes successfully
- [ ] Docs updated (`README.md`, `ai/README.md`, `docs/scoring/README.md`)
- [ ] No secrets committed, logs excluded
